meanings.sent1: Her hair looked unbrushed and messy after playing outside.
meanings.sent2: The unbrushed floor was covered in dust and dirt.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his unbrushed teeth could scare away vampires.
meanings.sent4: The unbrushed canvas of the painting gave it a raw, unfinished look.
meanings.sent5: The unbrushed fur of the dog felt rough to the touch.

meanings.definition: Not having been brushed or cleaned
meanings.sent1: The unbrushed horse had knots in its mane.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the unbrushed path, fearing ticks and bugs.
meanings.sent3: The unbrushed car windshield made it hard to see through the grime.
meanings.sent4: His unbrushed suit looked wrinkled and neglected.
meanings.sent5: The unbrushed dishes in the sink attracted flies.
